name: RECoil (itch) (ThanielPIN)
description:
DESCRIPTION:

A short game with 5 different stages where you play along your past attempts! Solve puzzles, defeat turrets, and beat the 10 second timer with only 3 loops.

This game was made for the Ludum Dare Jam 47. Theme is "Stuck in a loop."

CONTROLS:

WASD/Arrow KeysMoveClick/SpacebarShootMouseAimFFullscreen

CREDITS:

All assets in this game, including art, music and sound effects were made by me during the jam period.

UPDATE:
Project file has been included. If you own GameMaker Studio 2, you can make your own stages!
